algorithm_technique: Check sentence lengths, then use a set for efficient O(1) lookup of similar word pairs.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if two sentences are similar based on word-by-word similarity and equal length.
problem_summary_technical: Verify sentence length equality and then check word similarity using a hash set for O(1) pair lookups.
key_insights: The core idea is to quickly check if a pair of words is considered similar.
A set of tuples is efficient for storing and querying similar word pairs.
The problem explicitly states similarity is not transitive, simplifying the check.
